attributes.action: call a General Election IMMEDIATELY, as this Parliament no longer has moral authority to govern
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this is a failed government leading a  parliament with a sizeable number of morally bankrupt politicians, who consider themselves immune from the consequences that members of their electorates would face, should they attempt similar actions. the offers to restore situations and redress wrongdoings is not an option available to others and these people are not fit to consider and apply legislation to others. the general public should be offered the opportunity to express their concern and disgust.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
